tool_description: Find visa & passport requirements for different countries
name: Visa List
title: Visa List

api_list.name: Visa Requirement Details
api_list.description: Visa requirement of a country from origin country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://visa-list.p.rapidapi.com/public/visa/country/india/australia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "visa-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://visa-list.p.rapidapi.com/public/visa/country/{origin_country_slug}/{country_slug}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "visa-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Visa Requirements List
api_list.description: List of visa requirements of a country

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://visa-list.p.rapidapi.com/public/visa_requirements/country/{slug}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "visa-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
